channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk. Here's why I decided to sell the house
item.description: I should know by now, if you venture into an exploratory hypothetical conversation with a real estate broker, you might as well start packing. One casual conversation with a broker friend started the house hurricane.

item.title: Cardinal Mooney-Aquinas game voted best 2025 matchup to…
item.description: There are plenty of quality games on the high school football slates this year in Manatee and Sarasota counties. Out of all the games, theHerald-Tribuneselected 14 marquee matchupsfor the 2025 football season, including a couple of preseason classics.

item.title: Who is Jay Collins? DeSantis finally chooses new…
item.description: Gov. Ron DeSantis has filled another long-vacant spot in his cabinet, tapping Sen. Jay Collins, R-Tampa, to be hisnew lieutenant governor.

item.title: Three Claire's locations in the area could shut down in…
item.description: Three Claire's locations in the Sarasota-Bradenton area are at risk of closing following the company's most recent Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing.

item.title: Cameras to capture school-zone speeders in Sarasota and…
item.description: It's back to school time for students in Bradenton and Sarasota. Speeders beware.

item.title: Focus on gun violence, not food dyes in Fruit Loops
item.description: Wow, soon we won't have to worry aboutkiller dyein our kids' Fruit Loops.

item.title: Gov. Ron DeSantis taps Jay Collins to be Florida lieutenant governor
item.description: Gov. Ron DeSantis on Aug. 12 named state Sen.Jay Collins, R-Tampa, as the state's next lieutenant governor, ending a six-month vacancy in the position.

item.title: Allegiant announces new nonstop flight from SRQ
item.description: The Sarasota Bradenton International Airport announced a new Allegiant flight Tuesday, connecting Sarasota and Rochester, New York, with one-way fares as low as $59. The route is set to begin flying Feb. 13, 2026.
